'''Note:''' This article applies to MacBooks sold before June 2007

=== Current Issues ===

Wireless was detected in 6.06, but not in Edgy
No trackpad double tapping.
No trackpad scrolling.
Screen not dimmed on battery.
There still needs to be a solution for right clicking like there is in OS X.  
Brightness hot keys don't work.
No simple way to get the included Apple remote working.
Incorrect screen reslution
